message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I think it's a bit steep for me at $11,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to pay $9,200 for the product, can you consider that?
